MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL41 postcode area of Blaenau Ffestiniog. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:25pm. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and have established that there is a fallen tree on the overhead line network affecting the remaining customers. Our specialists are now on site and will work to restore power to all remaining customers as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:22pm on 9th February 2021.
